entry.data:
AREAS OF FREEZING FOG WITH PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 60

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
